other_title: Monster Musume: Everyday Life with Monster Girls
モンスター娘のいる日常
opening_theme: #1: "Saikousoku Fall in Love (最高速 Fall in Love)" by Miia (Sora Amamiya), Papi (Ari Ozawa), Centorea (Natsuki Aikawa), Suu (Mayuka Nomura), Mero (Haruka Yamazaki), Rachnera (Sakura Nakamura) (eps 1-6, 8-11)
#2: "Hey! Smith!! (Hey! スミス!!)" by Sumisu (Yuu Kobayashi) and MON [Zombina (Rei Mochizuki), Manako (Momo Asakura), Tionishia (Yurika Kubo), Doppel (Saori Oonishi)] (ep 7)
ending_theme: #1: "Hey! Smith!! (Hey! スミス!!)" by Sumisu (Yuu Kobayashi) and MON [Zombina (Rei Mochizuki), Manako (Momo Asakura), Tionishia (Yurika Kubo), Doppel (Saori Oonishi)] (eps 1-6, 8-11)
